snippet: Thefts of tires have risen, thanks to anonymous online marketplaces and advances in power tool technology that allow thieves to remove them with the speed of a Nascar pit crew.
abstract: Wheel and tire thefts rise around the country, thanks to anonymous online marketplaces that provide easy access to customers, and advances in power tool technology that allow thieves to remove them with the speed of a Nascar pit crew; community leaders say resurgence has prompted car owners to take special protective measures, like organizing neighborhood patrols, outfitting houses with street-facing surveillance cameras and using locking lug nuts to deter thefts.
lead_paragraph: Thefts of tires have risen, thanks to anonymous online marketplaces and advances in power tool technology that allow thieves to remove them with the speed of a Nascar pit crew.

headline.seo: Reviving an Old Crime, Wheel Thieves Put Cars Back Up on Blocks
headline.main: Fast-Paced Thieves Reinvent the Wheel Crime
headline.print_headline: Fast-Paced Thieves Reinvent the Wheel Crime
